long_description: The women's REI Revelcloud Hoodie jacket offers lightweight warmth for cold, dry days on the hiking trail. It stuffs easily into the bottom of your pack or into its own pocket when the temp warms up. Water- and wind-resistant Revelcloud jacket offers breathability and warmth without weighing you down; it layers easily under a shell on rainy days for the ultimate protection. Pertex(TM) Quantum recycled fabric and a soft lining create an incredibly lightweight, durable and packable jacket. PrimaLoft(R) Eco synthetic microfiber insulation insulates like down with its low bulk and excellent packability, yet still provides warmth even when wet. REI Revelcloud blocks winds up to 50 mph and the Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers, snow and stains. Full-length front zipper features an internal draft flap; chin guard protects skin from zipper abrasion. Stretch-bound cuffs; internal drawcord hem; zip hand pockets. REI Revelcloud jacket packs into its own interior lumbar pocket; use it for an emergency pillow.
